languages.text: "К величайшему сожалению, сейчас — нет, Ваша Светлость. После того, как немногочисленные представители Адептус Астра Телепатика на Даргонусе впали в буйство, часть псайкеров трагически усмирили надлежащие органы. С тех пор сообщение с окружающими системами стало крайне ненадежным. И слава Повелителю Человечества, что вам удалось отыскать путь в столицу!"

traits.locale_text: "К величайшему сожалению, сейчас — нет, Ваше Благородие. После того, как немногочисленные представители Адептус Астра Телепатика на Даргонусе впали в буйство, часть псайкеров трагически усмирили надлежащие органы. С тех пор сообщение с окружающими системами стало крайне ненадежным. И слава Повелителю Человечества, что вам удалось отыскать путь в столицу!"

languages.text: "Unfortunately, not at this time, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. After the few representatives of the Adeptus Astra Telepathica on Dargonus went into a frenzy, some of the psykers were tragically pacified by the respective authorities. Since then, communication with the neighbouring systems has been unreliable at best. Thanks be to the Master of Mankind that you managed to find your way to the capital!"
languages.original_text: "К величайшему сожалению, сейчас — нет, Ваша Светлость. После того, как немногочисленные представители Адептус Астра Телепатика на Даргонусе впали в буйство, часть псайкеров трагически усмирили надлежащие органы. С тех пор сообщение с окружающими системами стало крайне ненадежным. И слава Повелителю Человечества, что вам удалось отыскать путь в столицу!"

traits.locale_text: "Unfortunately, not at this moment, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. After the few representatives of the Adeptus Astra Telepathica on Dargonus went into a frenzy and were tragically pacified by the respective authorities, communication with the neighboring systems became unreliable at best. And thank the Galactic Sovereign that you've managed to find your way to the capital!"

"Unfortunately, not at this moment, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. After the few representatives of the Adeptus Astra Telepathica on Dargonus went into a frenzy and were tragically pacified by the respective authorities, communication with the neighboring systems became unreliable at best. And thank the Galactic Sovereign that you've managed to find your way to the capital!"

"Unfortunately, not at this time, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. After the few representatives of the Adeptus Astra Telepathica on Dargonus went into a frenzy, some of the psykers were tragically pacified by the respective authorities. Since then, communication with the neighbouring systems has been unreliable at best. Thanks be to the Master of Mankind that you managed to find your way to the capital!"

"Unfortunately, not at this time, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. After the few representatives of the Adeptus Astra Telepathica on Dargonus went into a frenzy, some of the psykers were tragically pacified by the respective authorities. Since then, communication with the neighbouring systems has been unreliable at best. Thanks be to the Master of Mankind that you managed to find your way to the capital!"

"Unfortunately, not at this time, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. After the few representatives of the Adeptus Astra Telepathica on Dargonus went into a frenzy, some of the psykers were tragically pacified by the respective authorities. Since then, communication with the neighbouring systems has been unreliable at best. Thanks be to the Master of Mankind that you managed to find your way to the capital!"

languages.text: “很遗憾，目前并非如此，大人。达戈努斯星语庭的少数代表发了疯之后，一部分灵能者随即便遭到了当局镇压。自那之后，与邻近星系的通信，就算往好了说，也只能说是非常不稳定。感谢人类之主，您成功地找到了前往首都的航线。”
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, not at this time, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. After the few representatives of the Adeptus Astra Telepathica on Dargonus went into a frenzy, some of the psykers were tragically pacified by the respective authorities. Since then, communication with the neighbouring systems has been unreliable at best. Thanks be to the Master of Mankind that you managed to find your way to the capital!"

traits.locale_text: “很遗憾，目前并非如此，大人。达戈努斯星语庭的少数代表发了疯之后，一部分灵能者随即便遭到了当局镇压。自那之后，与邻近星系的通信，就算往好了说，也只能说是非常不稳定。感谢人类之主，您成功地找到了前往首都的航线。”

languages.text: «Lamentablemente, ahora mismo no, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Cuando los representantes del Adeptus Astra Telepathica de Dargonus entraron en un frenesí, algunos de los psíquicos fueron trágicamente pacificados por las autoridades correspondientes. Desde entonces, la comunicación con los sistemas vecinos ha sido poco fiable en el mejor de los casos. ¡Gracias al Señor de la Humanidad que ha logrado volver a la capital!».
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, not at this time, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. After the few representatives of the Adeptus Astra Telepathica on Dargonus went into a frenzy, some of the psykers were tragically pacified by the respective authorities. Since then, communication with the neighbouring systems has been unreliable at best. Thanks be to the Master of Mankind that you managed to find your way to the capital!"

traits.locale_text: «Lamentablemente, ahora mismo no, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Cuando los representantes del Adeptus Astra Telepathica de Dargonus entraron en un frenesí, algunos de los psíquicos fueron trágicamente pacificados por las autoridades correspondientes. Desde entonces, la comunicación con los sistemas vecinos ha sido poco fiable en el mejor de los casos. ¡Gracias al Señor de la Humanidad que ha logrado volver a la capital!».

languages.text: 「残念ながら、現時点では連絡を取っておりません、陛下。ダルゴナスの銀河感応逓信局の数少ない代表者が騒ぎを起こした後、一部の異能者はそれぞれの当局によって悲劇的な形で鎮圧されました。それ以来、近隣の星系との通信は信頼性の低いものしか存在しません。あなたが首都へ戻ってこれたのは、まさに人類の盟主のおかげです！」
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, not at this time, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. After the few representatives of the Adeptus Astra Telepathica on Dargonus went into a frenzy, some of the psykers were tragically pacified by the respective authorities. Since then, communication with the neighbouring systems has been unreliable at best. Thanks be to the Master of Mankind that you managed to find your way to the capital!"

traits.locale_text: 「残念ながら、現時点では連絡を取っておりません、陛下。ダルゴナスの銀河感応逓信局の数少ない代表者が騒ぎを起こした後、一部の異能者はそれぞれの当局によって悲劇的な形で鎮圧されました。それ以来、近隣の星系との通信は信頼性の低いものしか存在しません。あなたが首都へ戻ってこれたのは、まさに人類の盟主のおかげです！」

languages.text: "Im Moment leider nicht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Nachdem die wenigen Vertreter des Adeptus Astra Telepathica auf Dargonus wahnsinnig geworden waren, mussten einige Psioniker tragischerweise von den zuständigen Behörden befriedet werden. Seitdem ist die Kommunikation mit den Nachbarsystemen bestenfalls unzuverlässig. Dank sei dem Herr der Menschheit, dass Ihr Euren Weg in die Hauptstadt gefunden habt!"
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, not at this time, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. After the few representatives of the Adeptus Astra Telepathica on Dargonus went into a frenzy, some of the psykers were tragically pacified by the respective authorities. Since then, communication with the neighbouring systems has been unreliable at best. Thanks be to the Master of Mankind that you managed to find your way to the capital!"

traits.locale_text: "Im Moment leider nicht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Nachdem die wenigen Vertreter des Adeptus Astra Telepathica auf Dargonus wahnsinnig worden waren, mussten einige Psioniker tragischerweise von den zuständigen Behörden befriedet werden. Seitdem ist die Kommunikation mit den Nachbarsystemen bestenfalls unzuverlässig. Dank sei dem Herr der Menschheit, dass Ihr Euren Weg in die Hauptstadt gefunden habt!"

languages.text: « Pas en ce moment, je le crains, Votre Seigneurie. Quand les représentants de l'Adeptus Astra Telepathica sur Dargonus ont perdu l'esprit, certains des psykers ont été neutralisés définitivement par les autorités. Depuis, les communications avec les systèmes voisins sont plus que précaires. Loué soit le Maître de l'Humanité pour vous avoir {mf|guidé|guidée} jusqu'à la capitale ! »
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, not at this time, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. After the few representatives of the Adeptus Astra Telepathica on Dargonus went into a frenzy, some of the psykers were tragically pacified by the respective authorities. Since then, communication with the neighbouring systems has been unreliable at best. Thanks be to the Master of Mankind that you managed to find your way to the capital!"

traits.locale_text: « Pas en ce moment, je le crains, Votre Seigneurie. Quand les représentants de l'Adeptus Astra Telepathica sur Dargonus ont perdu l'esprit, certains des psykers ont été neutralisés définitivement par les autorités. Depuis, les communications avec les systèmes voisins sont plus que précaires. Loué soit le Maître de l'Humanité pour vous avoir {mf|guidé|guidée} jusqu'à la capitale ! »

languages.text: "Ne yazık ki şu an hayır {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Dargonus'taki az sayıdaki Adeptus Astra Telepathica temsilcileri cinnet geçirmişti. Bunun ardından ilgili yetkililer, her ne kadar üzücü olsa da ruhsezerlerden bazılarını etkisiz hâle getirmek zorunda kalmıştı. O gün bu gündür de komşu sistemlerle iletişime güven olmuyor. İnsanlığın Efendisi'ne şükürler olsun ki başkente gelmeyi başarabildiniz!"
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, not at this time, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. After the few representatives of the Adeptus Astra Telepathica on Dargonus went into a frenzy, some of the psykers were tragically pacified by the respective authorities. Since then, communication with the neighbouring systems has been unreliable at best. Thanks be to the Master of Mankind that you managed to find your way to the capital!"

traits.locale_text: "Ne yazık ki şu an hayır {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Dargonus'taki sayıca az olan Adeptus Astra Telepathica temsilcileri cinnet geçirmişti. Bunun ardından ilgili yetkililer, her ne kadar üzücü olsa da, ruhsezerlerden bazılarını etkisiz hâle getirmek zorunda kalmıştı. O gün bu gündür de komşu sistemlerle iletişime güven olmuyor. İnsanlığın Efendisi'ne şükürler olsun ki başkente gelmeyi başarabildiniz!"
